actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to make certain Federal lands available to State and local governments for park and recreation purposes.

summary.text: Federal Lands for Parks and Recreation Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to make Federal lands available to State and local governments for park and recreation purposes. Specifies the criteria which such lands must meet before being so transferred.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to make certain Federal lands available to State and local governments for park and recreation purposes.
